name: Dungeons & Clicks
description:
Dungeons and Clicks, a game for the 1 bit clicker jam. Protect a jolly knight from the monsters within the dungeons. Smite them with your sword or perhaps you prefer to sit back and let magic missile do its job! Watch out for the pesky bombs as they'll KO the jolly knight! Gain points and keep the knight alive with potions dropped from the monsters!
